Summary: Very Bright white oval shaped object over DC/ Northern VA 2 days in a row
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to work through a section of North Arlington VA I noticed an extremly bright light in the crystal clear sky. The object was odd, it had an egg shape with no visable wings, blades, markings, windows, ect. If it had a color at all I'd say it was white, but it was more of a "glowing" white. It was 4:23 pm Wednesday only hours after the Popes speach in DC so at first I thought it could be some kind of secret Vadican aircraft. After slowing the car and rolling down the window I poked my head out to watch the object; it had been on a direct straight path moving south from DC at a slower pace, 100-200mph. It then began to move upwards when it changed speed and climbed vertically at a rediculous pace. It was gone within 1.5 secs. I go to work at the exact same time every day and pass through that section of Arlington at the same time mon- fri, and I viewed the very same object yesterday at the same time, same movement, ect...I'm hoping to make it three in a row today, this time I'll have my camera!
